name: Fariha Jannat
description: I feel like an idiot for not using Tailwind CSS until now.

name: Mahim Rahman
description: Have been working with CSS for over ten years and Tailwind just makes my life easier. It is still CSS and you use flex, grid, etc. but just quicker to write and maintain.

name: Rahim Rahman
description: If I had to recommend a way of getting into programming today, it would be HTML + CSS with Tailwind CSS.

name: Samir Ahmed
description: I’ve been writing CSS for over 20 years, and up until 2017, the way I wrote it changed frequently. It’s not a coincidence Tailwind was released the same year. It might look wrong, but spend time with it and you’ll realize semantic CSS was a 20 year mistake.

name: Sabbir Rahman
description: I was bad at front-end until I discovered Tailwind CSS. I have learnt a lot more about design and CSS itself after I started working with Tailwind. Creating web pages is 5x faster now.

name: Sabbir Rahman
description: I have no design skills and with Tailwind I can actually make good looking websites with ease and it's everything I ever wanted in a CSS framework.

name: Sabbir Rahman
description: Tailwind makes writing code feel like I’m using a design tool.

name: Sabbir Rahman
description: I don't use it but if I would use something I'd use Tailwind!
